summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganKYLIE SKIN Foaming Face Wash cleanses skin while helping to remove dirt, excess oil, and makeup for a fresh, bright complexion. It doesn't strip the skin of its natural moisture, and leaves it feeling so clean and hydrated.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently cleanses skin without stripping or drying it outLeaves face feeling soothed and hydratedLightly fragranced with a refreshing, clean scentClean*, Vegan**, Gluten Free, No Fragrance Added, Dermatologist-Tested**Formulated with no ingredients from animal originKey IngredientsGlycerin: A powerful humectant helping maintain skin's moistureCoconut-Based Surfactants: A mild alternative to traditional sulfates that creates a dense, creamy foam lather while being extra gentle on the skinItem 2595368How To UseApply one pump to wet skin in the morning and at night: Gently massage in circular motions. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Follow-up with the Face Moisturizer for a fresh, plumped finish.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Potassium Cocoate, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Seed Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Polyquaternium-39, Sodium Hyaluronate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply one pump to wet skin in the morning and at night: Gently massage in circular motions. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Follow-up with the Face Moisturizer for a fresh, plumped finish.

reviews.headline: A cleanser that leaves skin soft
reviews.comments: I bought this on a cruise ship and i have to rave i was in a panic because my elf skin care was breaking me out bad in takking red patches and irritation bumps all over i used this cleanser in a pack that included the  vitamin c serum toner and mousttizer and the next day redness disappeared! Bumps? Who is she i love this product so much planning to buy the full size from Ulta!

reviews.headline: ABSOLUTELY
reviews.comments: This foaming face wash is a do all for me that's sensitive and doesn't leave my skin feeling stripped. I normally have combination skin and not prone to acne, and this leaves my skin feeling the ultimate cleanse !

reviews.headline: ABSOLUTELY
reviews.comments: This foaming face wash is a do all for me that's sensitive and doesn't leave my skin feeling stripped. I normally have combination skin and not prone to acne, and this leaves my skin feeling the ultimate cleanse !

reviews.headline: Wish I could give a zero star
reviews.comments: Horrible not a single quality ingredient. Sad that she has this many ppl brainwashed. Although she sold it . still not good!

reviews.headline: Very bad
reviews.comments: Smells very bad,you can gage while you washing your face,eww,i just bought this product because of Kyle,and that make me didn't want to waste or buy any other of her products

reviews.headline: Very bad
reviews.comments: It does nothing to my skin,product smells so bad.

reviews.headline: Still my fave.
reviews.comments: Dear Kylie, please dont ever stop making this. I've been using this since day 1. Its the only face wash that works for my sensitive acne prone skin! Im a real customer and this is a real review. I love you!

reviews.headline: Just a no
reviews.comments: Terrible for skin

reviews.headline: Not my favorite
reviews.comments: I dont have senstive or acne prone skin. This product gave me pimples for the first time in 2 years. It also creates a film over my face that feels like Im in humid weather. I have like half a bottle left and I refuse to use it‚Äì I just like how it looks on my counter. If you exfoilate right after then maybe it would feel fine, but youd have to exfoliate everyday twice a day.

reviews.headline: Easy-going skins dark nightmare
reviews.comments:
Ok, so‚Ä¶ I have pretty decent skin that is not problem oriented; I can get away with ALOT.

This stuff is literally the antichrist of cleansers. I am telling you, run far away. Nothing breaks my skin out! This stuff gave me temporary acne..

reviews.headline: The only face wash  I will use!!!
reviews.comments: Ive been usung this for about 2 years. Anytime i have to use something different my face breaks out. My acne is bad, so it takes a week or more for the bleamishes to go away sometimes. Otherwise, i love this product and dont plan on changing!!!

reviews.headline: Still my fave
reviews.comments: Reviewing after using for 5 years... still my fave cleanser and go to. Cleanses very well and gives my fair skin a glow. I'm acne prone and break out easily, this helps keep my skin clear. If I go a few days without it, i see the difference.

reviews.headline: Great foam cleanser
reviews.comments: I love this foam cleanser. It is gentle on the skin. I find it cleans my skin well and does leave my skin feeling dry afterwards. I love the light clean kind of baby scent it has. Its very soothing to wash my face with this everytime.

reviews.headline: My go to cleanser
reviews.comments:
I love this cleanser, the foam feels so good. It feels so clean after using.
And it last a good long time üíï

reviews.headline: Best cleanser for my skin
reviews.comments: I have been buying this since the release.  It has been the BEST cleanser for my skin, and I'm in my mid-30s now.  I tried three other times switching to a different brand, and I couldn't even finish those bottles before coming back.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Love this stuff keeps my face clean at all times

reviews.headline: It's alright.
reviews.comments: I used this cleanser a few months ago, it was pretty alright. I didn't experience breakouts like other people, which is good. The reason it turns orange is because it contains Vitamin C, and it's just oxidizing. Mine oxidized even in the opaque bottle, but the formula didn't change. I feel like I might repurchase it just for funsies, but I wouldn't say I'd recommend it. It's pretty basic for the price, and you can probably benefit more from a brand like CeraVe, but it is fun to use.

reviews.headline: I use this for my showers and it feels really good.
reviews.comments: It's my favorite Face Wash and it really makes me feel that I have a clean and refreshed face.

reviews.headline: Burns and stinks
reviews.comments: Burned my face badly

reviews.headline: Wanted to love it but it made me break out
reviews.comments: I loved that this was a foam cleanser and that it felt so nice when washing my face. However, it made me break out terribly. I would stop using it and my face would clean up. Use it it again and would break out right after using it one time.

media.headline: The best skin cleanser ever.
media.caption: My skin has never looked better.

media.headline: The best face wash ever!!!

media.headline: This product is so awesome. Smooth skin.
media.caption: Love this

media.headline: I couldn't live without it
media.caption: My entire cheek was covered in zits a week ago. Kylie skin foaming cleanser removed all the blemishes and deep acne and it's starting to heal my face again! I live for this product!

media.headline: It turned orange.
media.caption: It is supposed to be clear.

media.headline: Buy this if you like products that go bad 7 weeks after open
One of the only face washes that makes my skin break out
media.caption: The packaging is pretty that's about it

faceoff_positive.comments: The absolute BEST. I forgot to order last time when I was running low and when I ran out my face broke out so badly, when I reordered it, it came so fast and within 2 days cleared my acne again! It's the ONLY product that works for me and I've tried so many. Kylie skin has changed my life by giving me the confidence in my skin that I never had before Kylie skin. Thank you < 3
faceoff_positive.headline: I couldn't live without it

faceoff_negative.comments: I thought I'd give it a try I ended up ordering the whole set. The foaming face wash absolutely felt great as I was washing my face my face felt super clean and I just love the consistency of the foam not too thick but not too runny it was perfect. However I've broke out unbelievable with big white zits. I struggle time to time with acne but not to where I consistently had acne I thought it was a change of product but after giving it a couple weeks and reading reviews I realized this product is not for me. Nothing against Kylie cosmetics just not for me.The foaming face wash absolutely felt great as I was washing my face my face felt super clean and I just love the consistency of the foam not too thick but not too runny it was perfect. However I broke out unbelievable with big White zither s. I struggle time to time with acne but not to where I consistently had acne I thought it was a change of product but after giving it a couple weeks and reading reviews I realized this product is not for me. Nothing against Kylie cosmetics just not for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: Unfortunately didn't work for me.
